test_data.instruction: Add a study session to your calendar for tomorrow from 2-4 PM in the library.

test_data.instruction:
What is the time complexity of binary search in a sorted array?
A. O(n)
B. O(log n)
C. O(n log n)
D. O(n²)
E. O(1)
test_data.explanation: Binary search divides the search space in half with each comparison, resulting in O(log n) time complexity.
